column1: 🎨 <small>:art:</small>  Improve structure / format of the code.
💄 <small>:lipstick:</small>  Add or update the UI and style files.
👷 <small>:construction_worker:</small>  Add or update CI build system.
📈 <small>:chart_with_upwards_trend:</small>  Add or update analytics or track code.
💩 <small>:poop:</small>  Write bad code that needs to be improved.
📦️ <small>:package:</small>  Add or update compiled files or packages.
👽️ <small>:alien:</small>  Update code due to external API changes.
💡 <small>:bulb:</small>  Add or update comments in source code.
💬 <small>:speech_balloon:</small>  Add or update text and literals.
🥚 <small>:egg:</small>  Add or update an easter egg.
💫 <small>:dizzy:</small>  Add or update animations and transitions.
🗑️ <small>:wastebasket:</small>  Deprecate code that needs to be cleaned up.
🛂 <small>:passport_control:</small>  Work on code related to authorization
🩹 <small>:adhesive_bandage:</small>  Simple fix for a non-critical issue.
